42c027e4ff9730fbb3de84c1af0d2c506e41c3e4:

5e22bbfc7232418b8d2dd646b952e404df5bd048: White House press secretary Tony Snow will step down on September 14. President Bush praised Snow's contributions and expressed confidence in his recovery. Snow cited financial reasons for leaving and plans to continue speaking out on issues.
